column3: News;Kampot Province: Preliminary reports said that at 9 am on September 5
column4: a body was discovered at a rented house in Sovann Sakor Village
column5: Kampot. ------The victim has been named as GUNNAR
column6: ENGELBERT  a 35-year-old German national.------Police gave cause of death as food or alcohol poisoning. The body has been transferred to Phnom Penh.------ ------Scene pics in link:------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/699010.html
